attributes.action: Introduce Amsterdam-style policing towards drugs in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is:

To change the way drugs are dealt with in britain to a strategy similar to that which is used in Holland.

To change drug classification from class A, B and C to HARD and SOFT drugs.

To use taxpayer's money to solve more serious matters such as hard drug abuse and alcohol abuse,allow establishments to grow and sell taxable cannabis to over 18's or 21's, which will in turn lower crime rates, drug abuse, and alcohol ralated anti-social behaiviour.

To agknowledge the benefits of industrial hemp fibres and oils not only as a food source and fibre, but a possible solution to the fossil fuel issue.

To introduce medical cannabis for people with chronic pain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
